name: The BishiBashi
overview:
THE ★ BishiBashi (ザ★ビシバシ Za ★ BishiBashi) is an arcade Bishi Bashi game (Konami multiplayer minigame competition game) released on July 29th, 2009 exclusively in Japan. It was developed and published by Konami.

The game features a variety of minigames, as well as a good range of selectable characters, some of them coming from some famous series such as the TwinBee, Dance Dance Revolution, Pop'n music and even Castlevania and Silent Hill series.
